meanings.definition: A traditional Polynesian drink made from the root of the kava plant.
meanings.sent1: The villagers gathered to drink ava during their celebration.
meanings.sent2: I tried ava for the first time at the cultural festival.
meanings.sent3: The chief accidentally spilled ava on his ceremonial robe.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of ava filled the air, transporting me to the Pacific islands.
meanings.sent5: The earthy taste of ava lingered on my tongue long after I drank it.

meanings.definition: A type of fabric made from the fibers of the Philippine plantain tree.
meanings.sent1: She wore a beautiful dress made of ava to the party.
meanings.sent2: The ava fabric was soft and comfortable against my skin.
meanings.sent3: The tailor mistakenly cut the ava cloth too short for the dress.
meanings.sent4: The ava material shimmered in the sunlight, catching everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: I felt elegant and unique in my ava outfit at the event.

meanings.definition: A female given name of Latin origin.
meanings.sent1: Ava is a popular name for baby girls in many countries.
meanings.sent2: My friend named her daughter Ava after her grandmother.
meanings.sent3: Ava's classmates often teased her by singing her name to the tune of a song.
meanings.sent4: The name Ava means 'life' in Latin, symbolizing vitality and energy.
meanings.sent5: When I hear the name Ava, I think of grace and strength.
